title: 12 Best Memorial Day Outdoor Furniture Sales 2025, Vetted By AD's Editors
description: Get in early so those loungers will be right on time for the long weekend BBQ
author: Nashia Baker, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Get in early with these Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales so those loungers will be right on time for the long weekend BBQ.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.As the weather turns to its sunnier side, the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales are exactly what you'll need to welcome better weather. Since bringing your current assortment out of hibernation, you might notice that your outdoor furniture could use a refresh. What types of items are on sale, you ask? Patio umbrellas, dining sets, sofas, and daybeds are all in the mix. Even essentials like fire pits and weather-resistant furniture covers are marked down. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

As the weather turns to its sunnier side, the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales are exactly what you'll need to welcome better weather. Alfresco hosting season is just about to ramp up—meaning the time to seriously contemplate your outdoor patio furniture needs is now. Since bringing your current assortment out of hibernation, you might notice that your outdoor furniture could use a refresh. (This is especially true if you live in a colder climate and leave your outdoor seating out in the elements—even acacia wood can crack if you leave a chair set sitting in the snow.)

Luckily, you can save as much 60% off from the best outdoor furniture stores during Memorial Day sale promotions. What types of items are on sale, you ask? Patio umbrellas, dining sets, sofas, and daybeds are all in the mix. Even essentials like fire pits and weather-resistant furniture covers are marked down. Without further ado, scroll below to find the best outdoor furniture sales and get a head start on revamping your backyard oasis.

Our Top Picks:

  • Best Lounge Chair: Design Within Reach Terassi Lounge Chair, $3,195 $2,236
  • Best Sectional: Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional Sofa, $4,402 $5,870
  • Best Coffee Table: Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table, $625 $1,250
  • Best Dining Set: Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set, $3,089 $3,168
  • Best Outdoor Pillow: Serena & Lily Perennials Harbor Stripe Pillow Cover, $130 $228

Outer: Up 50% Off Discontinued Items

Thanks to their sustainably made furniture and ease of delivery and assembly, Outer has long been an AD-favorite outdoor furniture brand. From dining sets that can seat up to eight to their new Adirondack and matching ottoman and furniture covers, you can nab everything you need to kick off the outdoor living season. Outer even includes the bug-repellent throws in their spring sale for when the pesky mosquitoes make their debut. Though we're waiting patiently for the brand's Memorial Day deals to drop, you can save up to 50% on discontinued items, open box, overstock, and clearance items like their eco-friendly outdoor rugs.

Outer Outdoor Ottoman

Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table

Lulu and Georgia: Up to 40% Off Select Styles

The hotspot for designer collaborations and curated collections may not be having an official outdoor furniture sale just yet, but if you look in the sale section, you can find some delicious deals, like the Marchesa pillow that’s a must to spruce up conversation sets, and the handcrafted Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed curvy planters. Indoor/outdoor rugs are also 50% off but you’ll have to get on a waitlist before you roll them out on your patio. But just picture how great they will look beneath a dining table—it’s certainly worth the wait.

Dempsy Low Planter by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Lulu and Georgia Marchesa Indoor/Outdoor Pillow

Interior Define: 25% Off Custom Furniture

We love Interior Define for its customizable approach. The styles are ideal for those who want to seamlessly merge their indoor style alfresco. Just glimpse their best-selling Jasper Collection that now has water-resistant outdoor upholstery, quick-dry foam cushions, and a teak base. The new Riva collection is on sale, too. We love how the weather-resistant teak wood frame sets it apart from most outdoor furniture silhouettes. Even if you’re not sure which colorway to choose from, just request free swatch samples. The brand carries both performance outdoor fabrics and those from Sunbrella.

Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional Sofa

Interior Define Riva Outdoor Ottoman

Burrow: Up to 25% Off Plus Free Shipping

Burrow is the place to go when you’re looking for modular pieces that need to fit into tricky places—say, a rooftop patio above the sunroom. The midcentury style of the Dunes collection is right up our alley when it comes to lounging (or even using it as a WFH perch). Made with FSC-certified teak that has a dense structure and higher concentration of oils, the seating set is bound to last for years with proper care. (Cue the teak cleaner kit to keep it turning from golden into silvery gray.) The upholstery is quick-drying and won’t absorb dirt and accidental spills. Our favorite part? Assembly is a cinch. Don’t forget to browse their clearance section, where you can find goodies at up to 70% off. Plus, you’ll get free shipping on all orders.

Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set

Burrow Dunes Teak 6-Piece Sectional

Amazon: Up to 40% Off

Hidden in Amazon’s many categories is its outdoor collection with up to 40% off must-haves like Adirondack chairs. Even as the weather warms up, an outdoor living space is hardly complete without heaters or fire pits to keep you cozy during the chillier early spring months. When it comes to the latter, this tiki fire pit offers a smokeless design and a durable metal frame built to last.

Tiki Smokeless Patio Fire Pit

Serwall Foldable Adirondack Chair

Serena & Lily: Up to 70% Off Plus Free Shipping on Clearance

Welcome coastal chic design to your outdoor space with Serena & Lily. We love the new colors for the Riviera dining chairs—from Coastal Blue to Lobster—and the brand’s for its beach-inspired furniture and outdoor decor. You’ll definitely want to pick up the Perennials Awning Stripe pillow covers while they last, but at $40 each (originally $218, it might be too long).

Serena & Lily Perennials Harbor Stripe Pillow Cover

Serena & Lily Del Mar Coffee Table

Wayfair: Up to 60% Off

Wayfair is a key destination for some of the biggest furniture sales you’ll find year-round (like the aptly named Way Day that takes place in May), but the brand’s daily sales page isn’t one to overlook. You’ll find outdoor bestsellers like rattan bistro sets and whimsical outdoor umbrellas up to 60% off right now.

Winston Porter 6-Person Extendable Outdoor Dining Set

Joss & Main Market Sunbrella

Design Within Reach: Up to 30% Off

If you want to create a high-end, design-forward space, look no further than Design Within Reach. Save big and add a sophisticated touch to your home’s exteriors with up to 50% off sale items and free shipping on all outdoor purchases. Pull out your credit card to shop our favorite finds like the stylish outdoor lounge chair to relax poolside as the sun peeks from behind the clouds.

Design Within Reach Terassi Lounge Chair

Design Within Reach Terassi Chaise

Castlery: Up to $500 Off

Calling all minimalists: Castlery brings an elevated, cozy feel to the outdoors with clean lines and weather-resistant materials. (Think teak lounge chairs with an included end table and wicker dining table sets.) For the brand's Memorial Day sale, snag up to $500 off sitewide.

Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa, 2 Lounge Chairs & Table Set

Castlery Rio Outdoor Ottoman

West Elm: Up to 50% Off

For a contemporary (and accessible) approach to your outdoor furniture, don’t skip West Elm’s offerings this Memorial Day. At this moment, you can take advantage of the brand’s outdoor furniture sale for 50% off au courant furniture and decor, like an indigo ceramic planter or expandable dining table.

West Elm Marta Ceramic Planter

West Elm Hargrove Outdoor Expandable Dining Table

Crate & Barrel: Up to 70% Off

During Crate & Barrel’s sale, you can score outdoor furniture for up to 70% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 30% off regular-priced outdoor items. Another brand with contemporary, traditional picks, you’ll find nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.

Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa

Crate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with Cushion

CB2: Up to 60% Off

A modern spin on items you’ll see at Crate & Barrel, sister site CB2 also includes up to 30% off spring layers, up to 60% markdowns, and double rewards on select outdoor pieces. We’re eyeing the brand’s collection of unique armchairs and teak planters to incorporate in any avant-garde outdoor area ahead of Memorial Day.

Cascata Twisted Indoor/Outdoor Planter by Mermelada Estudio

CB2 Cabra Teak Outdoor Corner Chair
